title: Neurology
content: The study and treatment of the nervous system fall under the field of medicine known as neurology. Neurodiagnostic is a subset of this field that focuses on the central and peripheral nervous systems. It involves the recording of bioelectrical activity to measure the electrical function of the brain, spinal cord, and nerves in the limbs or muscles.

title: Gastroenterology
